Sentencas: A comprehensive 3D computational fluid dynamics (CFD) model is developed for a bi-electrode supported cell (BSC) solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Bifunctionally Graded Electrode Supported SOFC Modeling and Computational Thermal Fluid Analysis for Experimental Design

Sentencas: The model includes complicated transport phenomena of mass/heat transfer, charge (electron and ion) migration, and electrochemical reactions.
Titulo: Bifunctionally Graded Electrode Supported SOFC Modeling and Computational Thermal Fluid Analysis for Experimental Design

Sentencas: The uniqueness of the modeling study is that functionally graded porous electrode property is taken into account, including not only linear but also nonlinear porosity distributions.
Titulo: Bifunctionally Graded Electrode Supported SOFC Modeling and Computational Thermal Fluid Analysis for Experimental Design

Sentencas: The model is validated using experimental data from open literature.
Titulo: Bifunctionally Graded Electrode Supported SOFC Modeling and Computational Thermal Fluid Analysis for Experimental Design

Sentencas: Numerical results indicate that BSC performance is strongly dependent on both operating conditions and porous microstructure distributions of electrodes.
Titulo: Bifunctionally Graded Electrode Supported SOFC Modeling and Computational Thermal Fluid Analysis for Experimental Design

Sentencas: Using the proposed fuel/gas feeding design, the uniform hydrogen distribution within the porous anode is achieved; the oxygen distribution within the cathode is dependent on porous microstructure distributions as well as pressure loss conditions.
Titulo: Bifunctionally Graded Electrode Supported SOFC Modeling and Computational Thermal Fluid Analysis for Experimental Design

Sentencas: Simulation results also show that fairly uniform temperature distribution can be obtained with the proposed fuel/gas feeding design.
Titulo: Bifunctionally Graded Electrode Supported SOFC Modeling and Computational Thermal Fluid Analysis for Experimental Design

Sentencas: This modeling work can provide a pre-experimental analysis and guide experimental designs for BSC test.
Titulo: Bifunctionally Graded Electrode Supported SOFC Modeling and Computational Thermal Fluid Analysis for Experimental Design
Bifunctionally Graded Electrode Supported SOFC Modeling and Computational Thermal Fluid Analysis for Experimental Design
